name: Helios
description: Helios is a multi-source addon for wako with the added ability to install custom provider. Helios allows users to connect to multiple online/offline services at once for their viewing with a single click.
author: Davy

changeLogs.2.0.3: Fix: Episodes not cached on RD but actually cached

- Lot of refactoring to simplify new updates.
- Big play button which will find the best source for you
- If you pick a source manually for an episode, Helios will try to find the equivalent source for the next episode (base on file name)
- The cup icon is the best source found By Helios. The one the Big play button will use
- Reorder/Toggle actions
- Add stats tab
